TopicTitle: Detaching lander from orbiter the lander spins

Articles.Content:
Hi guys so I'm trying to practice docking orbiting kerbin so I have a lander and a orbiter the orbiter has a command pod  bigger fuel can and thruster with rcs rechargable batteries and Solar panels  the lander has a landing can and 2 small fuel cans and thrusters rcs when I detach the docking port the lander spins uncontrollably and speeds up any ideas why?

Thanks

Edited December 3, 2018 by Gingerninger
No tags

Welcome to the forums!

A sreenshot of the lander would help much. Do you have a pilot on board of the lander? Does it spin faster without any further inputs from your side? Do you run out of ec on the lander? Without more info we can just guess what's going on
